DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether position changes during colonoscope withdrawal affects polyp detection rate. We hypothesize that positions change during scope withdrawal will increase polyp detection rate.
DOC.brief_title: Position Changes During Colonoscope Withdrawal and Polyp Detection
DOC.criteria: Outpatients undergoing colonoscopy Age 40 or greater Inpatient colonoscopy Unable to provide informed consent Unable to complete colonoscopy to cecum Previous bowel resection, inflammatory bowel disease, polyposis syndrome Musculoskeletal disorder or other mobility issue limiting effective patient position changes Inadequate bowel preparation
